ERR_ARGUMENT_COMMAND_MALFORMED: Invalid command format. Must be in the format 'addon::group/name' or 'group/name', got : {command}
ERR_COMMAND_CONTEXT: Error when creating context for command function {function} : {error}
ERR_COMMAND_FILE_NOT_FOUND: Command file not found for command {command}, in path "{path}"
ERR_COMMAND_TYPE_MISMATCH: Command type "{command_type}" does not match with resolver type "{resolver_type}" for command {command}
ERR_CORE_REPO_DIRTY:
{diff}
There is uncommitted changes in the repository
ERR_EXEC_NON_CLICK_METHOD: Trying to execute a non-click function '{function_name}', did you forget @click.command decorator ?
ERR_PYTHON_MINIMAL_VERSION: Python {expected} or later is required, actually running on {current}
ERR_USER_SHOULD_BE_SUDO_WHEN_EXEC_FUNCTI: Sudo use is expected when executed function {function}. Add @as_sudo() decorator in all parents functions, or allow this function to be ran in normal user to avoid this message.
ERR_USER_HAS_NO_DOCKER_PERMISSION:
User should have permission to run Docker. To give permission, add user to docker group : 
  sudo usermod -aG docker {username}
